alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 9:18PM CST until February 22 at 9:45PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Limestone County in north central Alabama... Northwestern Morgan County in north central Alabama... Central Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 945 PM CST. * At 917 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Courtland to 9 miles south of Town Creek, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Decatur, Athens, Moulton, Trinity, Courtland, Tanner, North Courtland, Hillsboro, French Mill and Chalybeate Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central and northwestern Alabama.
